member.name: T:Vuforia.EditorClasses.SerializedCylinderTarget
member.summary: This class provides utility properties to a serialized object targeting a CylinderTargetAbstractBehaviour

members.member:
This class wraps a SerializedObject of a TrackableBehaviour and provides utility-methods.
This class should be used when a trackable behaviour is modified in the editor and the changes should be made persistent. By using the SerializedProperties for editing Unity will automatically handle editor functionality, e.g. Undo/Redo It is possible that the serialized object is editing multiple objects simultaneously.

member.summary: Check whether all values of the serialized property are approximately equal. If so, change the property to have a unique value for all targets.
member.param: The property needs to have a floatValue
member.returns: true if the serialized property now contains one value.

member.summary: Get all values of serialized array

copy of the serialized array. note that changing this array does not affect the serializedproperty

member.summary: Remove first occurence of string-value in the serialized array
member.param: Property has to point to a string array
this value is removed from the array

member.summary: Add a string-value to a serialized array or list
member.param: Property has to point to a string array
this value is added to the array

member.summary: get array size and move serializedproperty to first item of array

member.name: T:Vuforia.EditorClasses.ConfigParser
member.summary: This class is used to parse the config.xml file into a ConfigData file and vice versa. The config.xml file is used to configure Trackables and Virtual Buttons. Implements a non-thread safe singleton pattern.

member.name: T:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderMeshFactory
member.summary: This class creates a mesh for a cylinder, cone, or conical frustum. The resulting mesh contains vertex positions, normals, and texture coordinates. The resulting mesh contains inward and outward faces and can therefore be viewed double-sided. The resulting mesh has one, two, or three submeshes: side geometry, top geometry (optional), bottom geometry (optional)

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderMeshFactory.CreateCylinderMesh(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a mesh for a cylinder, cone, or conical frustum.
member.param: Distance between point on top circle and corresponding point on bottom circle. Height for cylinders, slant height for cones.
Top diameter. For an upward cone it is zero. For a cylinder it is equal to the bottom diameter.
Bottom diameter. For a downward cone it is zero. For a cylinder it is equal to the top diameter.
Tesselation of the mesh is defined by setting the number of vertices per circle.
Define if optional top geometry should be generated.
Define if optional bottom geometry should be generated.
material used for the inside of the cylinder mesh

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderMeshFactory.AddSealingTriangles(System.Collections.Generic.List{UnityEngine.Vector3},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a circle for top or bottom geometry. Positions, normals, and texture coordinates are added.
member.param: Vertices of circle, must be parallel to xz-plane
define whether the circle is for the top or for the bottom geometry

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderMeshFactory.CreatePerimeterPositions(System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create positions for a circle at a specific height (y-coordinate). Note that the real height (y-coordinate) is used, not the sidelength

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderMeshFactory.CreatePerimeterUVCoordinates(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create texture coordinates for top or bottom geometry

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderMeshFactory.ConvertToUVCoordinates(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Convert a 3D-position to a texture coordinate for the side geometry.
member.param: angle in xz-plane
Slant height (sidelength) of 3D position

member.name: T:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderTargetEditor
member.summary: Editor for the CylinderTargetBehaviour

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderTargetEditor.UpdateAspectRatio(Vuforia.EditorClasses.SerializedCylinderTarget,Vuforia.EditorClasses.ConfigData.CylinderTargetData)
member.summary: Define the ratio between sidelength, top diameter, and bottom diameter. Geometry and materials are updated according to the new parameters.

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderTargetEditor.UpdateScale(Vuforia.EditorClasses.SerializedCylinderTarget,System.Single)
member.summary: Define a new scale for the cylinder target, which corresponds to the sidelength. If PreserveChildSize is true, all child objects will be scaled inversely in order to keep their original size.
member.param: Local scale of edited cylinder targets will be updated
Uniform scale of the target, corresponds to the sidelength

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderTargetEditor.UpdateGeometry(UnityEngine.GameObject,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates CylinderTarget. Deletes all parts and recreates them. Creates a mesh with vertices, normals, and texture coordinates. Top and bottom geometry are represented as separate submeshes, i.e. resulting mesh contains 1, 2, or 3 submeshes.
member.param: Game Object which contains the CylinderTargetBehaviour

member.name: M:Vuforia.EditorClasses.CylinderTargetEditor.UpdateMaterials(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create and return materials for cylinder targets. The newly created materials are based on the default material.

members.member:
Configure the Cylinder Target in this custom editor.
This method configures the cylinder target behaviour when it is first opened in the editor It assigns the default dataset and creates game objects for visualizing the cylinder. The result is equal to the CylinderTarget-prefab, even when the script is manually added to a gameobject.

member.summary: Lets the user choose a Cylinder Target from a drop down list. Cylinder Target must be defined in the "config.xml" file.
